General.Name: Light Management Group Inc
General.Description: Light Management Group, Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops new applications for optical and light technologies. It offers products based on its proprietary acousto-optic deflection and related non-diode laser, photonics, and optic technologies. These technologies are used in the fiber optic communications, biomedical, out-of-home advertising, industrial and aerospace markets. The company's main product lines include Acousto-Optic Switch, RGB Projection System, and Solid-State Diode-Pumped Lasers. Light Management Group, Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Burlington, Canada.
General.Address: 3060 Mainway Drive, Burlington, ON, Canada, L7M 1A3
